LayoutXML:
<layout>
  <tabs>
    <tab>
      <text>
        <lang lid="en" text="Summary"></lang>
      </text>
      <section>
        <text>
          <lang lid="en" text="Key Information"></lang>
        </text>
        <rows>
          <row>
            <cols>
              <col req="1" fieldid="CONTRACT_NUMBER" valign="top" fieldtype="1">
                <text>
                  <lang lid="en" text="##Contract## Number"></lang>
                </text>
              </col>
              <col fieldid="CONTRACT_STATUS" valign="top" fieldtype="2">
                <text>
                  <lang lid="en" text="Status"></lang>
                </text>
              </col>
            </cols>
          </row>
          <row>
            <cols>
              <col fieldid="CONTRACT_TITLE" colspan="3" valign="top" fieldtype="2">
                <text>
                  <lang lid="en" text="Title"></lang>
                </text>
              </col>
            </cols>
          </row>
          <row>
            <cols>
              <col fieldid="CONTRACT_OWNER" valign="top" fieldtype="2">
                <text>
                  <lang lid="en" text="##Contract## Owner"></lang>
                </text>
              </col>
              <col fieldid="CONTRACT_ENDDATE" valign="top" fieldtype="8">
                <text>
                  <lang lid="en" text="End Date"></lang>
                </text>
              </col>
            </cols>
          </row>
          <row>
            <cols>
              <col fieldid="CONTRACT_ACCOUNT_NAME" valign="top" colspan="3" fieldtype="2">
                <text>
                  <lang lid="en" text="##Account## Name"></lang>
                </text>
              </col>
            </cols>
          </row>
        </rows>
      </section>
      <section>
        <text>
          <lang lid="en" text="##Contract## Details"></lang>
        </text>
        <rows>
          <row>
            <cols>
              <col req="1" fieldid="CONTRACT_STARTDATE" valign="top" fieldtype="8">
                <text>
                  <lang lid="en" text="Start Date"></lang>
                </text>
              </col>
              <col fieldid="CONTRACT_DUE_DATE" valign="top" fieldtype="2">
                <text>
                  <lang lid="en" text="Auto Remider"></lang>
                </text>
              </col>
            </cols>
          </row>
          <row>
            <cols>
              <col fieldid="CUSTOMER_SIGNED_BY" valign="top" fieldtype="2">
                <text>
                  <lang lid="en" text="Customer Signed By"></lang>
                </text>
              </col>
              <col fieldid="COMPANY_SIGNED_BY" valign="top" fieldtype="2">
                <text>
                  <lang lid="en" text="Company Signed By"></lang>
                </text>
              </col>
            </cols>
          </row>
          <row>
            <cols>
              <col fieldid="CUSTOMER_SIGNED_ON" valign="top" fieldtype="8">
                <text>
                  <lang lid="en" text="Customer Signed Date"></lang>
                </text>
              </col>
              <col fieldid="COMPANY_SIGNED_ON" valign="top" fieldtype="8">
                <text>
                  <lang lid="en" text="Company Signed Date"></lang>
                </text>
              </col>
            </cols>
          </row>
          <row>
            <cols>
              <col fieldid="CUSTOMER_SIGNED_TITLE" nowrap="true" valign="top" fieldtype="2">
                <text>
                  <lang lid="en" text="Customer Signed Title"></lang>
                </text>
              </col>
              <col fieldid="CONTRACT_AMOUNT" valign="top" fieldtype="11">
                <text>
                  <lang lid="en" text="##Contract## Amount"></lang>
                </text>
              </col>
            </cols>
          </row>
        </rows>
      </section>
      <section containscustominfo="true">
        <text>
          <lang lid="en" text="Other Information"></lang>
        </text>
        <rows>
          <row>
            <cols>
              <col fieldid="BILLING_ADDRESS" valign="top" colspan="3" fieldtype="2">
                <text>
                  <lang lid="en" text="Billing Address"></lang>
                </text>
              </col>
            </cols>
          </row>
          <row>
            <cols>
              <col fieldid="CONTRACT_TERMS" colspan="3" valign="top" fieldtype="9">
                <text>
                  <lang lid="en" text="Special Terms"></lang>
                </text>
              </col>
            </cols>
          </row>
          <row>
            <cols>
              <col fieldid="CONTRACT_DESCRIPTION" colspan="3" valign="top" fieldtype="9">
                <text>
                  <lang lid="en" text="Description"></lang>
                </text>
              </col>
            </cols>
          </row>
        </rows>
      </section>
      <section showtext="true">
        <text>
          <lang lid="en" text="Useful Links"></lang>
        </text>
        <rows>
          <row>
            <cols>
              <col fieldid="CONTRACT_WEBINTEGRATION_LINKS" colspan="4" showlabel="false" relatedtype="37" listingtype="0" fieldtype="0">
                <text>
                  <lang lid="en" text="Web Integration URL Links"></lang>
                </text>
              </col>
            </cols>
          </row>
        </rows>
      </section>
    </tab>
    <tab>
      <text>
        <lang lid="en" text="##Products##"></lang>
      </text>
      <section showtext="true">
        <text>
          <lang lid="en" text="##Products## under this ##Contract##"></lang>
        </text>
        <rows>
          <row>
            <cols>
              <col fieldid="CONTRACT_RELATED_PRODUCTS" colspan="4" showlabel="false" relatedtype="34" listingtype="0" fieldtype="40">
                <text>
                  <lang lid="en" text="##Products## under this ##Contract##"></lang>
                </text>
              </col>
            </cols>
          </row>
        </rows>
      </section>
    </tab>
    <tab>
      <text>
        <lang lid="en" text="Approval"></lang>
      </text>
      <section showtext="true">
        <text>
          <lang lid="en" text="Approval Information"></lang>
        </text>
        <rows>
          <row>
            <cols>
              <col fieldid="CONTRACT_RELATED_APPROVAL" colspan="4" showlabel="false" relatedtype="57" listingtype="0" fieldtype="40">
                <text>
                  <lang lid="en" text="Approval Information"></lang>
                </text>
              </col>
            </cols>
          </row>
        </rows>
      </section>
    </tab>
    <tab>
      <text>
        <lang lid="en" text="Activities"></lang>
      </text>
      <section showtext="true">
        <text>
          <lang lid="en" text="Open Activities"></lang>
        </text>
        <rows>
          <row>
            <cols>
              <col fieldid="CONTRACT_OPEN_ACTIVITIES" colspan="4" showlabel="false" relatedtype="43" listingtype="3" fieldtype="40">
                <text>
                  <lang lid="en" text="Open Activities"></lang>
                </text>
              </col>
            </cols>
          </row>
        </rows>
      </section>
      <section showtext="true">
        <text>
          <lang lid="en" text="Closed Activities"></lang>
        </text>
        <rows>
          <row>
            <cols>
              <col fieldid="CONTRACT_CLOSED_ACTIVITIES" colspan="4" showlabel="false" relatedtype="43" listingtype="4" fieldtype="40">
                <text>
                  <lang lid="en" text="Closed Activities"></lang>
                </text>
              </col>
            </cols>
          </row>
        </rows>
      </section>
    </tab>
    <tab>
      <text>
        <lang lid="en" text="Collaboration"></lang>
      </text>
      <section showtext="true">
        <text>
          <lang lid="en" text="Related ##Issues##"></lang>
        </text>
        <rows>
          <row>
            <cols>
              <col fieldid="CONTRACT_RELATED_ISSUES" colspan="4" showlabel="false" relatedtype="19" listingtype="7" fieldtype="40">
                <text>
                  <lang lid="en" text="Related ##Issues##"></lang>
                </text>
              </col>
            </cols>
          </row>
        </rows>
      </section>
      <section showtext="true">
        <text>
          <lang lid="en" text="Related ##Requirements##"></lang>
        </text>
        <rows>
          <row>
            <cols>
              <col fieldid="CONTRACT_RELATED_REQUIREMENTS" colspan="4" showlabel="false" relatedtype="52" listingtype="8" fieldtype="40">
                <text>
                  <lang lid="en" text="Related ##Requirements##"></lang>
                </text>
              </col>
            </cols>
          </row>
        </rows>
      </section>
    </tab>
    <tab>
      <text>
        <lang lid="en" text="Attachments"></lang>
      </text>
      <section showtext="true" containscustominfo="false">
        <text>
          <lang lid="en" text="Attached Notes and Documents" />
        </text>
        <rows>
          <row>
            <cols>
              <col req="3" readonly="0" fieldid="CONTRACT_RELATED_ATTACHMENTS" fieldtype="40" relatedtype="129" listingtype="0" deftype="0" defexp="" valign="middle" colspan="4" showlabel="false">
                <text>
                  <lang lid="en" text="Attached Notes and Documents" />
                </text>
              </col>
            </cols>
          </row>
        </rows>
      </section>
    </tab>
    <tab>
      <text>
        <lang lid="en" text="##Notes##"></lang>
      </text>
      <section showtext="true" containscustominfo="false">
        <text>
          <lang lid="en" text="Related NOTES" />
        </text>
        <rows>
          <row>
            <cols>
              <col req="3" readonly="0" fieldid="CONTRACT_RELATED_NOTES" fieldtype="40" relatedtype="4" listingtype="5" deftype="0" defexp="" valign="middle" colspan="4" showlabel="false">
                <text>
                  <lang lid="en" text="Related NOTES" />
                </text>
              </col>
            </cols>
          </row>
        </rows>
      </section>
    </tab>
    <tab>
      <text>
        <lang lid="en" text="History"></lang>
      </text>
      <section showtext="true">
        <text>
          <lang lid="en" text="##Contract## History"></lang>
        </text>
        <rows>
          <row>
            <cols>
              <col fieldid="CONTRACT_HISTORY" colspan="4" showlabel="false" relatedtype="56" listingtype="6" fieldtype="40">
                <text>
                  <lang lid="en" text="##Contract## History"></lang>
                </text>
              </col>
            </cols>
          </row>
        </rows>
      </section>
    </tab>
  </tabs>
</layout>
